formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide a unique name for the configuration, keeping in mind that you may need to create additional configurations over time.

formElement.label: Description:
formElement.documentation: Provide a simple description for this configuration.

formElement.label: vCloudDirector Url:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name or IP address of the vCloud Director server.

formElement.label: Login as:
formElement.documentation: VMware vCloud Director account username/password. This account must have enough privileges to perform API funtions.

formElement.label: vCloudDirector Organization:
formElement.documentation: Indicate the organization for the authentication.

formElement.label: Attempt Connection?:
formElement.documentation: Attempt a connection to check credentials.

formElement.label: Retry Request on failure?:
formElement.documentation: Retry a request up to 10 times on VCD error.

formElement.label: Retry attempts count:
formElement.documentation: Sets retry attempts count when Retry Request on Failure is enabled.

formElement.label: Retry interval:
formElement.documentation: Interval between attempts if Retry Request on Failure is enabled.

formElement.label: Debug Level:
formElement.documentation: Level for output: 0=errors only, 1=normal headers and responses, 2+=debugging information included.
